// replace images 
const artList = [
    {
      title: "Sky Spaghetti",
      medium: "Blender, Adobe Substance Painter, Adobe Photoshop",
      year: 2023,
      description: "In this three-dimensional homage to Bangkok's iconic electrical poles, I sought to capture the mesmerizing dance of wires that crisscross the cityscape like a tangled symphony.",
      imageUrls: [ 
        "/3D_Folder/Sky1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/Sky2.jpg"
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Rico's Drug",
      medium: "Blender, Unity, Adobe Photoshop",
      year: 2023,
      description: "As the foundation for an immersive game experience, this 3D project transports players into a kaleidoscopic world where reality blurs and the boundaries of the mind dissolve.",
      imageUrls: [ 
        "/3D_Folder/Rico1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/Rico2.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/Rico3.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/Rico4.jpg"
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "ATM",
      medium: "Blender, Adobe Substance Painter",
      year: 2023,
      description: "Prop work for Rico's Drug. Attempting to create more 3D assets that are realisitc, high quality, interactive, and optimized for broswer use/ WEBGL",
      imageUrls: [ 
        "/3D_Folder/atm1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/atm2.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/atm3.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/atm4.jpg",
    ]
    },
    {
      title: "Little Sister",
      medium: "Blender, Adobe Substance Painter, Adobe Photoshop",
      year: 2021,
      description: "...",
      imageUrls: [
        "/3D_Folder/d2.png",
         "/3D_Folder/d3.png",
         "/3D_Folder/d4.png",

      ]
    },

    {
      title: "Weapons",
      medium: "Blender, Adobe Substance Painter, Adobe Photoshop",
      year: 2023,
      description: "Collection of realistic concept weapons, optimized for WEBGL",
      imageUrls: [ 
        "/3D_Folder/Hammer1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/Hammer2.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/mace1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/mace2.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/mace3.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/scythe1.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/scythe2.jpg",
        "/3D_Folder/scythe3.jpg",
      ]
    },

  ];
  
  module.exports = artList;
